features.featureTitle: Replace the current plain-text file download logic in the 'Download Bill' button (App.tsx) with PDF generation using the html2pdf.js library. When clicked, the button should capture the bill content area (customer name, items table, subtotal, GST, grand total) and download it as a PDF file named 'zweeti-bill.pdf'. The button must remain hidden during print. Load html2pdf.js via npm package or CDN import compatible with the existing React/Vite build setup.
